definition: a skullcap worn by nuns under a veil or by soldiers under a hood of mail or formerly by British sergeants-at-law, to arrange attractively
details:
noun
- a skullcap worn by nuns under a veil or by soldiers under a hood of mail or formerly by British sergeants-at-law
- the arrangement of the hair (especially a woman's hair)
= synonyms: hairdo, hairstyle, hair style, coiffure
verb
- to arrange attractively
= synonyms: dress
- to cover with a coif
